<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 66, 468, 84]]<|/det|> Daraus erhalten wir die Wendestelle <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[500, 99, 920, 116]]<|/det|> \[x_1 = 0. \qquad (57)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 129, 483, 147]]<|/det|> Durch Einsetzen finden wir die Werte <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[159, 156, 920, 193]]<|/det|> \[e(x_1) = e(0) = \frac{e^0 - e^{-0}}{2} = \frac{1 - 1}{2} = 0 \qquad (58)\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[159, 199, 920, 236]]<|/det|> \[e'(x_1) = e'(0) = \frac{e^0 + e^{-0}}{2} = \frac{1 + 1}{2} = 1 \qquad (59)\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 240, 920, 277]]<|/det|> \[e''(x_1) = e''(0) = \frac{e^0 + e^{-0}}{2} = \frac{0 + 1}{2} = 1. \qquad (60)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 285, 695, 303]]<|/det|> Wir stellen die Ergebnisse in der folgenden Tabelle zusammen. <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[270, 314, 800, 371]]<|/det|>
kxke(xk)e'(xk)e''(xk)e'''(xk)Typ
100101 > 0Wendepunkt
<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[123, 386, 402, 404]]<|/det|> f) Wir betrachten die Funktion <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 413, 920, 440]]<|/det|> \[f(x) := e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}}. \qquad (62)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 452, 675, 470]]<|/det|> Für die erste, zweite und dritte Ableitung von \(d\) erhalten wir <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[159, 480, 920, 515]]<|/det|> \[f'(x) = -\frac{2x}{2} \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} = -x \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} \qquad (63)\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 521, 920, 558]]<|/det|> \[f''(x) = -1 \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} - x \cdot (-1) \cdot \frac{2x}{2} \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} = (x^2 - 1) \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} \qquad (64)\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 562, 920, 597]]<|/det|> \[f''''(x) = (2x - 0) \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}} + (x^2 - 1) \cdot (-1) \cdot \frac{2x}{2} \cdot e^{-\left(\frac{x^2}{2}\right)} = (3x - x^3) \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}}. \qquad (65)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 604, 430, 622]]<|/det|> An den Wendestellen von \(f\) gilt <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[371, 632, 920, 660]]<|/det|> \[0 = f''(x) = (x^2 - 1) \cdot e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}}\qquad \text{und} \qquad x_2 = 1. \qquad \text{und} \qquad x_2 = 1. \qquad \text{(66)}\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[371, 669, 920, 689]]<|/det|> \[0 = (x^2 - 1) = (x + 1) \cdot (x - 1). \qquad (67)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[230, 703, 560, 720]]<|/det|> Daraus erhalten wir die Wendestellen <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[428, 735, 920, 753]]<|/det|> \[x_1 = -1 \quad \text{und} \quad x_2 = 1. \qquad (68)\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[150, 767, 480, 784]]<|/det|> Durch Einsetzen finden wir die Werte <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[0, 792, 920, 912]]<|/det|> \[f(x_1) = f(-1) = e^{-\frac{(-1)^2}{2}} = e^{-\frac{1}{2}} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{e}} \qquad (69)\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[0, 920, 920, 999]]<|/det|> \[f''(x_1) = f''(-1) = -(1) \cdot e^{-\frac{(-1)^2}{2}} = e^{-\frac{1}{2}}\frac{1}{\sqrt{e}} \qquad (70)\] \[f''''(x_1) = f'''(-1) = (3 \cdot (-1) - (-1)^3) \cdot e^{-\frac{(-1)^2}{2}} = (-3 + 1) \cdot e^{-\frac{1}{2}} = -\frac{2}{\sqrt{e}} \qquad (71)\]
